snippet: Dominique Strauss-Kahn, the former head of the I.M.F. whose reputation suffered from a series of sex scandals, will be an economic adviser to Belgrade.
abstract: Dominique Strauss-Kahn, former head of the International Monetary Fund whose career has been buffeted by a series of sexual scandals, will become economic adviser to Serbian government.
lead_paragraph: Dominique Strauss-Kahn, the former head of the I.M.F. whose reputation suffered from a series of sex scandals, will be an economic adviser to Belgrade.

headline.main: Serbia Appoints Strauss-Kahn as an Economic Adviser
headline.print_headline: Serbia Appoints Strauss-Kahn as an Economic Adviser
